name: M Wiggins
biography:
Wiggins has been programming his entire life after learning his alphabet on an apple][ keyboard.  He has been working with Concentric Sky for just over a year.  Prior to that he has spent several years as a software developer for several other companies.  He led the development team for michaelmoore.com and santefe.edu at Concentric Sky.  
Wiggins knows many different languages, and enjoys learning new ones.  He has published some android software in his spare time as Hlidskialf Software
